title: C'est Parti!
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Elle a tort Jacinthe de se pencher comme ca' by Odette Joyeux.
description: Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”. Stephane receives orders from Morales to substitute the jewels back on arrival in Montreal. To convince him to obey orders, Morales reminds him that Olympe is now a de facto accomplice since she is the one who cleared the jewels through customs. In Paris, Bicou and Jacinthe are in possession of a necklace without knowing that it is part of the treasure. Lulu is trying is hardest to recover them from the children.  Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain. Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.
related_objects: Series; S002034; Le Tresor des Hollandais; Active; 1969
